assessment.title: üéØ Is My Advisory Right for You?
assessment.subtitle: Identify your challenges and discover if we're the right partner for your AI strategy.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You know data and AI can drive value ‚Äî but the connection to revenue, cost, or differentiation isn't always clear.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Without a clear link to business goals, efforts become siloed, unfocused, or purely experimental ‚Äî resulting in low ROI.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I bridge the strategy-execution gap by aligning AI initiatives to tangible business outcomes, creating a focused, value-driven roadmap.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You operate under intense time pressure with multiple competing priorities.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: AI and data decisions are complex, technical, and easy to delay ‚Äî or get wrong ‚Äî without the right insight.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I provide concise, executive-ready guidance that accelerates smart decision-making while simplifying complex landscapes.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: The market is flooded with AI promises, tools, and platforms.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Leaders struggle to discern what's genuinely valuable from what's just buzz ‚Äî risking paralysis or misinvestment.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I serve as a trusted filter ‚Äî vetting trends, technologies, and vendors to focus efforts on what's mature, meaningful, and aligned with business needs.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: Every business collects data ‚Äî but most aren't fully using it to drive insight or automation.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Poor data quality, silos, or unclear ownership often block progress, making AI efforts slow or ineffective.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I help assess data readiness, build foundational capabilities, and prioritize use cases that unlock immediate and long-term value.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: You want to use AI to grow revenue, improve margins, or differentiate from competitors.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: You often don't know where to start, or lack internal capability to move beyond pilots.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I identify quick wins and scalable strategies that help businesses use AI for meaningful, measurable advantage.

situation.title: Situation
situation.text: Data and AI create value ‚Äî but also expose companies to regulatory, ethical, and reputational risks.

complication.title: Complication
complication.text: Without a strategy for responsible AI use, companies risk non-compliance, biased outcomes, or public backlash.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: I bring proven governance frameworks and ethical design principles to ensure AI is deployed safely, responsibly, and in line with emerging regulation.
